an4.178:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:1.5: Tassa sakkayanirodham manasi karoto sakkayanirodhe cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
an4.178:1.6: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkayanirodho patikankho.
an4.178:1.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso lepagatena hatthena sakham ganheyya, tassa so hattho sajjeyyapi ganheyyapi bajjheyyapi;
an4.178:1.8: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:1.10: Tassa sakkayanirodham manasi karoto sakkayanirodhe cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
an4.178:1.11: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkayanirodho patikankho.
an4.178:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:2.3: Tassa sakkayanirodham manasi karoto sakkayanirodhe cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
an4.178:2.4: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkayanirodho patikankho.
an4.178:2.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso suddhena hatthena sakham ganheyya, tassa so hattho neva sajjeyya na ganheyya na bajjheyya;
an4.178:2.6: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:2.8: Tassa sakkayanirodham manasi karoto sakkayanirodhe cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
an4.178:2.9: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkayanirodho patikankho.
an4.178:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:3.3: Tassa avijjappabhedam manasi karoto avijjappabhede cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
an4.178:3.4: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjappabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:3.6: Tassa puriso yani ceva ayamukhani tani pidaheyya, yani ca apayamukhani tani vivareyya, devo ca na samma dharam anuppaveccheyya.
an4.178:3.7: Evanhi tassa, bhikkhave, jambaliya na alippabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:3.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:3.10: Tassa avijjappabhedam manasi karoto avijjappabhede cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
an4.178:3.11: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjappabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:4.3: Tassa avijjappabhedam manasi karoto avijjappabhede cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
an4.178:4.4: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjappabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:4.6: Tassa puriso yani ceva ayamukhani tani vivareyya, yani ca apayamukhani tani pidaheyya, devo ca samma dharam anuppaveccheyya.
an4.178:4.7: Evanhi tassa, bhikkhave, jambaliya alippabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:4.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram santam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharati.
an4.178:4.10: Tassa avijjappabhedam manasi karoto avijjappabhede cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati adhimuccati.
an4.178:4.11: Tassa kho evam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjappabhedo patikankho.
an4.178:4.12: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
